data.communities: comp.lang.perl.modules, email exchanges with author of Digest module
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides a complete implementation of the NIST SHA
    standard: i.e. it supports all algorithms of the standard, and
    allows for bit-string as well as byte inputs. For this reason,
    newsgroup participants recommended that the module be named
    Digest::SHA. This module conforms to all naming conventions and
    interface styles specified in the CPAN Digest module.

    I submitted a registration request for this module over 7 months
    ago. Brian D. Foy informs me that he was unable to find the
    registration data for this module. So, he recommended that I
    re-submit it, and he would personally attend to getting it
    registered. If you have any questions, please email me at

    mshelor@comcast.net

    Thanks, Mark
